item.title: Planned Parenthood Sues In Nevada To Keep Teens’ Abortions Secret From Their Parents
item.description: Studies show that abortion -- whether by scalpel or pill -- kills babies and leaves physical, mental, and emotional scars on women and girls.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: ‘This Should NOT Be Included’ — Read Intel Officials’ Objections To ‘Extremely Sketchy’ Steele Dossier
item.description: Officials warned the Steele dossier suffered from 'POOR SOURCE TRADECRAFT' and compared it to the National Enquirer.

item.title: Latest Unsealed Docs Expose Obama, Hillary, And The Russia Lie
item.description: The declassified House Intelligence Committee report found the Kremlin had lots of dirt on Clinton it could have used, but didn't.
